import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { CartContext } from '../CartContext' import { getProductData } from '../ProductsStore' import { useContext } from 'react' function CartProduct(props) { const cart = useContext(CartContext) const id = props.id const quantity = props.quantity const productData = getProductData return ( <>

{productData.title}

{quantity} total

${(quantity * productData.price).toFixed(2)}

) } export default CartProduct
